Class Smoothie

  • java.lang.Object
    • Smoothie
  • public class Smoothie
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that processes info for smoothie drinks
    Author:
    Andrew Christian

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double calcPrice()
      Overrides the Beverage calcPrice method adds $1.00 for every size increase above small adds $0.50 to base cost for every piece of fruit added adds $1.50 to base cost if protein powder was added

      Overrides the equals methods
      boolean equals​(Smoothie otherBev)

      Return the base price of all beverages

      Return name of beverage

      Returns the number of fruits added to the smoothie

      Return the cost to up the size of the beverage

      • calcPrice

        public double calcPrice()
        Overrides the Beverage calcPrice method adds $1.00 for every size increase above small adds $0.50 to base cost for every piece of fruit added adds $1.50 to base cost if protein powder was added
        Returns:
        cost- the total cost of the beverage
